conclusion: NOT_FEASIBLE - Baseline already implements Variable Projection (VarPro) with ANALYTIC intensity optimization. Grid search would be WORSE than the existing closed-form solution.
key_finding: The baseline separates position optimization (CMA-ES) from intensity (analytic). Intensity is already computed optimally via least-squares closed-form solution. Grid search would add overhead without improvement.

technical_analysis.baseline_approach: Variable Projection (VarPro) - CMA-ES optimizes (x,y) only, intensity computed analytically via least-squares
technical_analysis.proposed_approach: Grid search 10 intensity values after finding position

comparison.accuracy: Analytic > Grid search (continuous vs 10 discrete points)
comparison.speed: Analytic > Grid search (0 extra sims vs 10 extra sims)
comparison.implementation: Analytic already implemented, grid search would be regression

technical_analysis.conclusion: Experiment proposes an approach that's ALREADY IMPLEMENTED in a SUPERIOR form
